demoSteps.name: Welcome
demoSteps.voiceText: Welcome to the voice-first insurance application demo. Watch as a customer applies for insurance entirely through natural conversation. No typing, no forms - just a phone call.

narrator.title: Voice-First Insurance
narrator.text: Customer calls the insurance company. Agent answers. Application completes through conversation.
narrator.subtitle: Zero friction onboarding

demoSteps.name: Customer Calls
demoSteps.voiceText: Michael opens the Tilt Insurance app and taps the Call Now button to speak with an agent.

demoSteps.name: Dialing
demoSteps.voiceText: The phone dials out. Connecting to the first available insurance agent.

demoSteps.name: Agent Picks Up
demoSteps.voiceText: Sarah, an insurance agent, answers the call.

demoSteps.name: Agent Greeting
demoSteps.voiceText: Hello! Thanks for calling Tilt Insurance. I'm Sarah. How can I help you today?

demoSteps.name: Customer Introduction
demoSteps.voiceText: Hi Sarah, I need insurance for my consulting business. My name is Michael Torres.

demoSteps.name: Agent Instructs
demoSteps.voiceText: Perfect, Michael! I can help with that. Just say 'open the application' and I'll pull up the form on your screen as we talk.

demoSteps.name: Michael Opens App
demoSteps.voiceText: Okay, open the application.

demoSteps.name: Personal Information
demoSteps.voiceText: My date of birth is May 12th, 1985, and my business is called Torres Consulting LLC.

demoSteps.name: Agent Confirms Details
demoSteps.voiceText: Great! I've got all that down. Now, what type of consulting do you do?

demoSteps.name: Business Details
demoSteps.voiceText: I'm a business strategy consultant, working mostly with tech companies.

demoSteps.name: Coverage Discussion
demoSteps.voiceText: Perfect. Based on what you do, I'd definitely recommend Professional Indemnity and Cyber Insurance. Does that sound good?

demoSteps.name: Customer Accepts
demoSteps.voiceText: Yes, that makes sense. I definitely want both of those. What about Public Liability?

demoSteps.name: Coverage Finalized
demoSteps.voiceText: Public Liability is great for client meetings. I'll add that too. All three coverages are now selected.

demoSteps.name: Package Options
demoSteps.voiceText: The Recommended package gives you solid coverage at great value. It's what most consultants choose.

demoSteps.name: Package Selection
demoSteps.voiceText: The recommended package looks perfect. Let's go with that one.

demoSteps.name: Payment Options
demoSteps.voiceText: Excellent choice! You can pay yearly or monthly. Any preference?

demoSteps.name: Payment Decision
demoSteps.voiceText: I'd prefer to pay annually if there's a discount for that.

demoSteps.name: Payment Confirmed
demoSteps.voiceText: There is! You'll save sixty two pounds paying annually. Your new total is one thousand one hundred seventy eight pounds.

demoSteps.name: Review Application
demoSteps.voiceText: Let me confirm everything. You're Michael Torres, Torres Consulting LLC, with Professional Indemnity, Cyber, and Public Liability coverage at one thousand one hundred seventy eight pounds annually. Is that all correct?

demoSteps.name: Customer Confirms
demoSteps.voiceText: Yes, that's all correct. Let's proceed with that.

demoSteps.name: Payment Setup
demoSteps.voiceText: Perfect! You can either speak your bank details securely, or enter them on your phone while we're on the call. Which do you prefer?

demoSteps.name: Payment Method Choice
demoSteps.voiceText: I'll enter it on my phone.

demoSteps.name: Processing Payment
demoSteps.voiceText: No problem. I can't see your details for security. Just let me know when you're done.

demoSteps.name: Payment Complete
demoSteps.voiceText: Okay, I've entered everything.

demoSteps.name: Policy Issued
demoSteps.voiceText: Great! Your payment is set up. Processing your policy now. Congratulations, Michael! Your policy is active right now. Everything we discussed is confirmed, and you're fully covered.

demoSteps.name: Customer Satisfaction
demoSteps.voiceText: Wow, that was so easy! I didn't have to fill out anything. Thank you, Sarah!

demoSteps.name: Call Complete
demoSteps.voiceText: You're very welcome! That's exactly what we're here for. Have a great day!

demoSteps.name: Business Impact
demoSteps.voiceText: Voice-first onboarding eliminates all typing friction. Customers speak naturally, applications auto-complete, and agents guide seamless conversations that convert.

narrator.title: Voice Transforms Insurance
narrator.text: No forms to fill. No typing required. Just natural conversation that captures everything.
narrator.subtitle: The future of onboarding
